notifications_empty: Messages and notifications will appear here
user_empty_liked_videos: Liked videos will show up here
settings_best_quality_desc: This may cause video stuttering on slow connections.
settings_color_primary_desc: Color to use for buttons, app bars, and themed text.
settings_color_bottom_bar_desc: Color to use for the bottom bar.
settings_color_icon_desc: Color to use for the icons in the bottom bar.
settings_reset_desc: Clear all user settings. (Note: This will NOT log you out.)
not_implemented_msg: This feature will (maybe) be added at a later date.
reset_warning: Are you sure that you wish to clear the current settings? This will not log you out of your account.
sign_in_message: Sign in to view your account
sign_in_success: You are now logged in. Press OK to reload.
sign_out_warning: Are you sure that you want to sign out? After signing out, the app will reload.
